description:
The #1 children’s app in more than 25 countries! Watch, play and learn

PlayKids is a mobile and tablet entertainment platform packed with entertaining and age-appropriate videos, eBooks, games and lullabies specifically for children aged five and under. PlayKids is a trusted source for parents, easing concerns about their kids watching content online.  The PlayKids app provides popular, suitable programming for young children that are both entertaining and educational.   Because it allows for offline viewing, parents can save on data usage while taking PlayKids wherever they go. 

The PlayKids train contains your kids favorite programs all in one place.  Caillou, Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood, Sid the Science Kid, Pajanimals, Dinosaur Train, Peg + Cat, Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom, The Hive, Rob the Robot and Nursery Rhymes and more.

There are over 200 episodes of your kids favorite shows available on PlayKids!   

A new Spanish language content wagon just added to the train!

TV SHOWS, GAMES & MUSIC
In our Playground Wagon, your child will enjoy a train car full of activities. Help Lupi, our conductor, tidy up his room. Have fun with a Magic piano that plays all of your preschoolers’ favorite songs. Utilize the Memory games made especially for toddlers to develop their memory skills. Enjoy the Coloring books and instructions for some fun drawings for your future artist.

Your child will enjoy classic story books and lullabies, each in their own wagon, perfect for bedtime or naptime.

CHILD-FRIENDLY LAYOUT
Designed with your little one in mind.
Age-appropriate and simple to use.
Kids can choose from three interactive themes; Classic, Submarine and Fantasy

WATCH OFFLINE
You can use PlayKids on trips, in restaurants, cars, airplanes, doctors’ appointments, waiting rooms and on the way to school.  No Wi-Fi or Internet needed. The content is stored directly on your mobile device.
You can also use PlayKids on your iPhone and iPad with one subscription.

FOR PARENTS
Safe for Kids and Ad Free
Parent can control what your child watches and decide which shows will be available to them.
Put together a playlist and keep your child occupied without having to press any buttons to start a new video.
PlayKids is certified by the kidSAFE® Seal Program. To learn more, visit www.kidsafeseal.com.
 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Here is what parents are saying:
 
"A life saver! - Better then Netflix for the little ones. My 2 year old daughter can play with it on her own."
 
“All the TV shows my daughter wants in just one app! The best app for kids!” 

“My four year old daughter absolutely loves this app. It keeps her entertained on long road trips with the multitude of choices she has to watch. I would recommend this app to anyone with a toddler.”

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
 
PlayKids is a premium children’s Entertainment subscription service. Get unlimited access to all current and future videos, books, games, lullabies and more for a subscription fee which renews automatically.
 
Subscription Details:

- You can cancel your subscription anytime – no cancelation fee.
- Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Your iTunes account will automatically be charged at the same price for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current monthly period unless you change your subscription preferences in your account settings.
- You can manage your subscriptions through your Account Settings after purchase.
- You can find instructions on how to manage and cancel subscriptions here: http://support.playkidsapp.com/
trackCensoredName: PlayKids | Videos and Educational Games for Kids and Toddlers!
